ai-patthana15.10:0.2_0: The Order of the Dhamma: allows unintelligent in the Khadehaka, and constantly preciously,
ai-patthana15.10:0.3_0: Talking for the sake of constantly,
ai-patthana15.10:1.1_0: for the sake of a decrease,
ai-patthana15.10:1.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana15.10:2.1_0: for the sake of goal, not for the sake of decrease, not for the sake of increase ...
ai-patthana15.10:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana15.10:3.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
